01307 #ifndef HAVE_PTHREAD_CANCEL
01308 #ifdef SIGCANCEL
01309 #define CCXX_SIG_THREAD_CANCEL SIGCANCEL
01310 #else
01311 #define CCXX_SIG_THREAD_CANCEL SIGQUIT
01312 #endif
01313 #define pthread_cancel(x) pthread_kill(x, CCXX_SIG_THREAD_CANCEL)
01314 #define pthread_setcanceltype(x, y)
01315 #define pthread_setcancelstate(x, y)
01316 #endif
01317 
01318 #ifndef HAVE_PTHREAD_SETCANCELTYPE
01319 #ifdef HAVE_PTHREAD_SETCANCEL
01320 enum
01321 { PTHREAD_CANCEL_ASYNCHRONOUS = CANCEL_ON,
01322   PTHREAD_CANCEL_DEFERRED = CANCEL_OFF};
01323 enum
01324 { PTHREAD_CANCEL_ENABLE = CANCEL_ON,
01325   PTHREAD_CANCEL_DISABLE = CANCEL_OFF};
01326 #define pthread_setcancelstate(x, y) \
01327         (y == NULL) ? pthread_setcancel(x) : *y = pthread_setcancel
01328 #define pthread_setcanceltype(x, y) \
01329         (y == NULL) ? pthread_setasynccancel(x) | *y = pthread_setasynccancel(x)
01330 #else
01331 #define pthread_setcanceltype(x, y)
01332 #define pthread_setcancelstate(x, y)
01333 #endif
01334 #endif
